00019 back_polygon::back_polygon(psstream& o): out(o)

00023 int back_polygon::new_vertex(double x, double y)
00024 {
00025   int n = ver.size();
00026   ver.push_back(coord_type());
00027   coord_type* p = &ver.back();
00028   p->xcoord = x;
00029   p->ycoord = y;
00030   return n;
00031 }
00032 
00033 void back_polygon::begin_curve()
00034 {
00035   ver.clear();
00036   cur.clear();
00037 }
00038 
00039 void back_polygon::add_vertex(int n)
00040 {
00041   cur.push_back(n);
00042 }
00043 
00044 void back_polygon::end_curve()
00045 {
00046   out.setrgbcolor(1.0, 1.0, 0.5);
00047   out.newpath();
00048   curve_type::iterator c = cur.begin();
00049   const coord_type* p = &ver[*c];
00050   out.moveto(p->xcoord, p->ycoord);
00051   while (++c != cur.end())
00052   {
00053     p = &ver[*c];
00054     out.lineto(p->xcoord, p->ycoord);
00055   }
00056   out.fill();
00057   out.setgray(0.0);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void plotpath(psstream& out, const vertex_type& ver, const edge_type& ee)
00061 {
00062   assert(!ee.empty());
00063   for (edge_type::const_iterator e = ee.begin(); e != ee.end(); ++e)
00064   {
00065     const curve_type& c = *e;
00066     curve_type::const_iterator q = c.begin();
00067     const coord_type* p = &ver[*q];
00068     out.moveto(p->xcoord, p->ycoord);
00069     while (++q != c.end())
00070     {
00071       p = &ver[*q];
00072       out.lineto(p->xcoord, p->ycoord);
00073     }
00074     if (is_closed(c))
00075     {
00076       out.closepath();
00077     }
00078   }
00079 }

00081 class s_curve
00082 {
00083   const int n;
00084   bool closed;
00085   double *xx;
00086   double *yy;
00087   double *ss;
00088 
00089 public:
00090   s_curve(const vertex_type& ver, const curve_type& cur);
00091   ~s_curve();
00092   
00093   double length() const;
00094   void position(double s, double *x, double *y) const;
00095   bool forward(double s, double w, double *g, double *dg) const;
00096   bool backward(double s, double w, double *g, double *dg) const;
00097   bool is_closed() const;
00098 };
00099 
00100 s_curve::s_curve(const vertex_type& ver, const curve_type& cur): 
00101   n(cur.size()), closed(cur.front() == cur.back()), 
00102   xx(new double[n]), yy(new double[n]), ss(new double[n])
00103 {
00104   int i = 0;
00105   for (curve_type::const_iterator c = cur.begin(); c != cur.end(); ++c, ++i)
00106   {
00107     int j = *c;
00108     xx[i] = ver[j].xcoord;
00109     yy[i] = ver[j].ycoord;
00110   }
00111   ss[0] = 0.0;
00112   for (i = 1; i < n; ++i)
00113   {
00114     double dx = xx[i] - xx[i-1];
00115     double dy = yy[i] - yy[i-1];
00116     double dd = hypot(dx, dy);
00117     ss[i] = ss[i-1] + dd;
00118   }
00119 }
00120 
00121 s_curve::~s_curve()
00122 {
00123   delete[] ss;
00124   delete[] yy;
00125   delete[] xx;
00126 }
00127 
00128 double s_curve::length() const
00129 {
00130   return ss[n-1];
00131 }
00132 
00133 bool  s_curve::is_closed() const
00134 {
00135   return closed;
00136 }
00137 
00138 void s_curve::position(double s, double *x, double *y) const
00139 {
00140   if (is_closed()) s = modulo_range(s, length());
00141   assert(s >= 0.0 && s <= length());
00142   int i = std::lower_bound(ss, ss+n-1, s) - ss;
00143   if (s == ss[i])
00144   {
00145     *x = xx[i];
00146     *y = yy[i];
00147   }
00148   else
00149   {
00150     double t = (s - ss[i-1]) / (ss[i] - ss[i-1]);
00151     *x = xx[i-1] + t * (xx[i] - xx[i-1]);
00152     *y = yy[i-1] + t * (yy[i] - yy[i-1]);
00153   }
00154 }
00155 
00156 bool s_curve::forward(double s, double w, double *s0, double* w0) const
00157 {
00158   double p[2], p1[2], p2[2];
00159   double d1, d2, s1, s2, t;
00160 
00161   if (s < 0.0 || s > length())
00162     return false;
00163 
00164   assert(0.0 <= s && s <= length());
00165   assert(0.0 < w && w < length());
00166 
00167   int i = std::lower_bound(ss, ss+n-1, s) - ss;
00168   if (s == ss[i])
00169   {
00170     p[0] = xx[i];
00171     p[1] = yy[i];
00172     if (++i == n)
00173     {
00174       if (!is_closed())
00175         return false;
00176       i = 1;
00177     }
00178   }
00179   else
00180   {
00181     t = (s - ss[i-1]) / (ss[i] - ss[i-1]);
00182     p[0] = xx[i-1] + t * (xx[i] - xx[i-1]);
00183     p[1] = yy[i-1] + t * (yy[i] - yy[i-1]);
00184   }
00185 
00186   p1[0] = p[0];
00187   p1[1] = p[1];
00188   s1 = s;
00189   d1 = 0.0;
00190   *w0 = 0.0;
00191   if (is_closed())
00192   {
00193     int ii = i;
00194     do
00195     {
00196       p2[0] = xx[i];
00197       p2[1] = yy[i];
00198       s2 = ss[i];
00199       d2 = hypot(p2[0]-p[0], p2[1]-p[1]);
00200       if (d2 > w)
00201       {
00202         t = (w - d1) / (d2 - d1);
00203         assert (0.0 <= t && t <= 1.0);
00204         *s0 = s1 + t * (s2 - s1);
00205         *w0 = (*w0 + *s0) - s;
00206         return true;
00207       }
00208       if (++i == n)
00209       {
00210         *w0 += length();
00211         i = 1;
00212       }
00213       p1[0] = p2[0];
00214       p1[1] = p2[1];
00215       s1 = s2;
00216     }
00217     while (ii != i);
00218     return false;
00219   }
00220 
00221   while(true)
00222   {
00223     p2[0] = xx[i];
00224     p2[1] = yy[i];
00225     s2 = ss[i];
00226     d2 = hypot(p2[0]-p[0], p2[1]-p[1]);
00227     if (d2 > w)
00228     {
00229       t = (w - d1) / (d2 - d1);
00230       assert (0.0 <= t && t <= 1.0);
00231       *s0 = s1 + t * (s2 - s1);
00232       *w0 = (*w0 + *s0) - s;
00233       return true;
00234     }
00235     if (++i == n)
00236       break;
00237     p1[0] = p2[0];
00238     p1[1] = p2[1];
00239     s1 = s2;
00240   }
00241   return false;
00242 }
00243 
00244 bool s_curve::backward(double s, double w, double *s0, double* w0) const
00245 {
00246   double p[2], p1[2], p2[2];
00247   double d1, d2, s1, s2, t;
00248 
00249   if (s < 0.0 || s > length())
00250     return false;
00251 
00252   assert(0.0 <= s && s <= length());
00253   assert(0.0 < w && w < length());
00254 
00255   int i = std::lower_bound(ss, ss+n-1, s) - ss;
00256   if (s == ss[i])
00257   {
00258     p[0] = xx[i];
00259     p[1] = yy[i];
00260   }
00261   else
00262   {
00263     t = (s - ss[i-1]) / (ss[i] - ss[i-1]);
00264     p[0] = xx[i-1] + t * (xx[i] - xx[i-1]);
00265     p[1] = yy[i-1] + t * (yy[i] - yy[i-1]);
00266   }
00267   if (i-- == 0)
00268   {
00269     if (!is_closed())
00270       return false;
00271     i = n-2;
00272   }
00273 
00274   p1[0] = p[0];
00275   p1[1] = p[1];
00276   s1 = s;
00277   d1 = 0.0;
00278   *w0 = 0.0;
00279   if (is_closed())
00280   {
00281     int ii = i;
00282     do
00283     {
00284       p2[0] = xx[i];
00285       p2[1] = yy[i];
00286       s2 = ss[i];
00287       d2 = hypot(p2[0]-p[0], p2[1]-p[1]);
00288       if (d2 > w)
00289       {
00290         t = (w - d1) / (d2 - d1);
00291         *s0 = s1 + t * (s2 - s1);
00292         *w0 = (*w0 + *s0) - s;
00293         return true;
00294       }
00295       if (i-- == 0)
00296       {
00297         *w0 -= length();
00298         i = n-1;
00299       }
00300       p1[0] = p2[0];
00301       p1[1] = p2[1];
00302       s1 = s2;
00303     }
00304     while (ii != i);
00305     return false;
00306   }
00307 
00308   while(true)
00309   {
00310     p2[0] = xx[i];
00311     p2[1] = yy[i];
00312     s2 = ss[i];
00313     d2 = hypot(p2[0]-p[0], p2[1]-p[1]);
00314     if (d2 > w)
00315       break;
00316     if (i-- == 0)
00317       return false;
00318     p1[0] = p2[0];
00319     p1[1] = p2[1];
00320     s1 = s2;
00321   }
00322   t = (w - d1) / (d2 - d1);
00323   *s0 = s1 + t * (s2 - s1);
00324   *w0 = s - *s0;
00325   return true;
00326 }
00327 
00328 static void hatch_curve(psstream& out, double line_width, int hatch_step, \
00329   const vertex_type& ver, const curve_type& g)
00330 {
00331   s_curve cur(ver, g);
00332 
00333   double curve_len = cur.length();
00334   double hatch_dist = line_width * hatch_step;
00335   if (curve_len > 2.0 * hatch_dist)
00336   {
00337     double dist = 0.0;
00338     int n_hatch = (int) floor(curve_len / hatch_dist);
00339     if (cur.is_closed())
00340     {
00341       hatch_dist = curve_len / n_hatch;
00342     }
00343     else
00344     {
00345       dist = 0.5 * (curve_len - n_hatch * hatch_dist);
00346     }
00347 
00348     double dg, s2, s1 = dist, g = 0.0;
00349     while (cur.forward(s1, line_width, &s2, &dg))
00350     {
00351       double x, y, x1, y1, x2, y2;
00352       cur.position(s1, &x1, &y1);
00353       cur.position(s2, &x2, &y2);
00354       double dx = x2 - x1;
00355       double dy = y2 - y1;
00356       double dd = hypot(dx, dy);
00357       double nx = dy / dd;
00358       double ny = -dx / dd;
00359       double s = 0.5 * (s1 + s2);
00360       cur.position(s, &x, &y);
00361       out.moveto(x, y);
00362       x += 2.0 * line_width * nx;
00363       y += 2.0 * line_width * ny;
00364       out.lineto(x, y);
00365       s1 += hatch_dist;
00366       g += hatch_dist;
00367       if (g > (curve_len - dist - line_width))
00368         break;
00369     }
00370   }
00371 }
00372 
00373 void hatch_edge(psstream& out, double line_width, int hatch_step, \
00374   const vertex_type& ver, const edge_type& ee)
00375 {
00376   for (edge_type::const_iterator e = ee.begin(); e != ee.end(); ++e)
00377   {
00378     if (e->empty())
00379       continue;
00380     hatch_curve(out, line_width, hatch_step, ver, *e);
00381   }
00382 }

00384 
00385 struct glyph_type
00386 {
00387   char ch[2];
00388   double ww;
00389   double x1, y1;
00390   double x2, y2;
00391   double nx, ny;
00392   double x0, y0;
00393   double a;
00394 };
00395 
00396 static void output_bounding_polygon(int n_glyph, const glyph_type* glyph, double gx, double gy,
00397   pgn_builder* pgn)
00398 {
00399   pgn->begin_curve();
00400 
00401   // left edge
00402   int clip_first = pgn->new_vertex(glyph[0].x1 - gy * glyph[0].nx + gx * glyph[0].ny, \
00403     glyph[0].y1 - gy * glyph[0].ny - gx * glyph[0].nx);
00404   int clip_index = clip_first;
00405   pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);
00406   pgn->new_vertex(glyph[0].x1 + gy * glyph[0].nx + gx * glyph[0].ny, \
00407     glyph[0].y1 + gy * glyph[0].ny - gx * glyph[0].nx);
00408   pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);
00409 
00410   // top edge
00411   for (int i = 1; i < n_glyph; ++i)
00412   {
00413     if (glyph[i-1].nx * glyph[i].ny > glyph[i].nx * glyph[i-1].ny)
00414     {
00415       pgn->new_vertex(glyph[i-1].x2 + gy * glyph[i-1].nx, glyph[i-1].y2 + gy * glyph[i-1].ny);
00416       pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);
00417       pgn->new_vertex(glyph[i].x1 + gy * glyph[i].nx, glyph[i].y1 + gy * glyph[i].ny);
00418       pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);          
00419     }
00420     else
00421     {
00422       double x1 = glyph[i-1].x2 + gy * glyph[i-1].nx;
00423       double y1 = glyph[i-1].y2 + gy * glyph[i-1].ny;
00424       double x2 = glyph[i].x1 + gy * glyph[i].nx;
00425       double y2 = glyph[i].y1 + gy * glyph[i].ny;
00426       double nx = 0.5 * (glyph[i-1].nx + glyph[i].nx);
00427       double ny = 0.5 * (glyph[i-1].ny + glyph[i].ny);
00428       double nn = hypot(nx, ny);
00429       double dx = 0.5 * (x1 + x2) - glyph[i].x1;
00430       double dy = 0.5 * (y1 + y2) - glyph[i].y1;
00431       double dd = gy * gy / hypot(dx, dy);
00432       pgn->new_vertex(glyph[i].x1 + nx * dd / nn, glyph[i].y1 + ny * dd / nn);
00433       pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);          
00434     }
00435   }
00436 
00437   // right edge
00438   pgn->new_vertex(glyph[i-1].x2 + gy * glyph[i-1].nx - gx * glyph[i-1].ny, \
00439     glyph[i-1].y2 + gy * glyph[i-1].ny + gx * glyph[i-1].nx);
00440   pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);
00441   pgn->new_vertex(glyph[i-1].x2 - gy * glyph[i-1].nx - gx * glyph[i-1].ny, \
00442     glyph[i-1].y2 - gy * glyph[i-1].ny + gx * glyph[i-1].nx);
00443   pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);
00444 
00445   // bottom edge
00446   while (--i)
00447   {
00448     if (glyph[i-1].nx * glyph[i].ny < glyph[i].nx * glyph[i-1].ny)
00449     {
00450       pgn->new_vertex(glyph[i].x1 - gy * glyph[i].nx, glyph[i].y1 - gy * glyph[i].ny);
00451       pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);          
00452       pgn->new_vertex(glyph[i-1].x2 - gy * glyph[i-1].nx, glyph[i-1].y2 - gy * glyph[i-1].ny);
00453       pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);          
00454     }
00455     else
00456     {
00457       double x1 = glyph[i-1].x2 - gy * glyph[i-1].nx;
00458       double y1 = glyph[i-1].y2 - gy * glyph[i-1].ny;
00459       double x2 = glyph[i].x1 - gy * glyph[i].nx;
00460       double y2 = glyph[i].y1 - gy * glyph[i].ny;
00461       double nx = -0.5 * (glyph[i-1].nx + glyph[i].nx);
00462       double ny = -0.5 * (glyph[i-1].ny + glyph[i].ny);
00463       double nn = hypot(nx, ny);
00464       double dx = 0.5 * (x1 + x2) - glyph[i].x1;
00465       double dy = 0.5 * (y1 + y2) - glyph[i].y1;
00466       double dd = gy * gy / hypot(dx, dy);
00467       pgn->new_vertex(glyph[i].x1 + nx * dd / nn, glyph[i].y1 + ny * dd / nn);
00468       pgn->add_vertex(clip_index++);          
00469     }
00470   }
00471   pgn->add_vertex(clip_first);
00472   pgn->end_curve();
00473 }
00474 
00475 static bool place_text_curve(int ng, glyph_type* g, const s_curve& c, \
00476   double c_pos, double text_width, double text_height, double text_gap, \
00477   pgn_builder* pgn)
00478 {
00479   double x1, y1, x2, y2;
00480   c.position(c_pos, &x1, &y1);
00481   c.position(c_pos + text_width, &x2, &y2);
00482   
00483   bool (s_curve::*dir)(double, double, double*, double*) const = &s_curve::forward;
00484   double a = atan2(y2-y1, x2-x1);
00485   if (a < 0.0) a += 2.0 * M_PI;
00486   a = 360.0 * a / (2.0 * M_PI);
00487 
00488   double pos_curr = c_pos;
00489   if (a >= 90.0 && a < 270.0)
00490   {
00491     pos_curr += text_width;
00492     dir = &s_curve::backward;
00493   }
00494 
00495   for (int i = 0; i < ng; ++i)
00496   {
00497     double pos_next, cum_delta;
00498     bool ok = (c.*dir)(pos_curr, g[i].ww, &pos_next, &cum_delta);
00499     assert(ok);
00500     c.position(pos_curr, &x1, &y1);
00501     c.position(pos_next, &x2, &y2);
00502     double dx = x2 - x1;
00503     double dy = y2 - y1;
00504     double dd = hypot(dx, dy);
00505     double x0 = 0.5 * (x1 + x2);
00506     double y0 = 0.5 * (y1 + y2);
00507     double a = 360.0 * atan2(dy, dx) / (2.0 * M_PI);
00508     g[i].x1 = x1;
00509     g[i].x2 = x2;
00510     g[i].y1 = y1;
00511     g[i].y2 = y2;
00512     g[i].nx = dy / dd;
00513     g[i].ny = -dx / dd;
00514     g[i].x0 = x0;
00515     g[i].y0 = y0;
00516     g[i].a = a;
00517     pos_curr = pos_next;
00518   }
00519 
00520   // select tolerance of 10 degrees between two sequential segment
00521   for (i = 1; i < ng; ++i)
00522   {
00523     if (fabs(g[i-1].nx * g[i].ny - g[i-1].ny * g[i].nx) > 0.17)
00524       break;
00525   }
00526 
00527   if (i != ng)
00528     return false;
00529 
00530   output_bounding_polygon(ng, g, text_gap, text_gap + 0.5 * text_height, pgn);
00531   return true;
00532 }
00533 
00534 void annotpath(psstream& out, const vertex_type& path_ver, const edge_type& path_edge, \
00535   const char* text, double step, double gap, pgn_builder* pgn)
00536 {
00537   int n_glyph = strlen(text);
00538   glyph_type *glyph = new glyph_type[n_glyph];
00539   double text_width = 0.0, text_height = 0.0;
00540   for (int i = 0; i < n_glyph; ++i)
00541   {
00542     double bb[4];
00543     glyph[i].ch[0] = text[i];
00544     glyph[i].ch[1] = '\0';
00545     out.textbox(glyph[i].ch, bb);
00546     
00547     double glyph_width = bb[2] - bb[0];
00548     glyph[i].ww = glyph_width;
00549     text_width += glyph_width;
00550 
00551     double glyph_height = bb[3] - bb[1];
00552     if (text_height < glyph_height) 
00553       text_height = glyph_height;
00554   }
00555 
00556   for (edge_type::const_iterator e = path_edge.begin(); e != path_edge.end(); ++e)
00557   {
00558     if (e->empty())
00559       continue;
00560 
00561     s_curve cur(path_ver, *e);
00562     double curve_len = cur.length();
00563     double annot_dist = text_width + step;
00564     if (curve_len < annot_dist)
00565       continue;
00566 
00567     double curve_dist = 0.0;
00568     double annot_gap = step;
00569     int n_annot = (int) floor(curve_len / annot_dist);
00570     if (cur.is_closed())
00571     {
00572       annot_gap = (curve_len - n_annot * text_width) / n_annot;
00573       annot_dist = annot_gap + text_width;
00574     }
00575     else
00576     {
00577       curve_dist = 0.5 * (curve_len - ((n_annot-1) * annot_dist + text_width));
00578     }
00579 
00580     for (int j = 0; j < n_annot; ++j)
00581     {
00582       if (place_text_curve(n_glyph, glyph, cur, curve_dist, \
00583         text_width, text_height, gap, pgn))
00584       {
00585         for (i = 0; i < n_glyph; ++i)
00586         {
00587           double bb[8];
00588           out.annot(glyph[i].x0, glyph[i].y0, 1.0, glyph[i].a, \
00589             psstream::ANNOT_CENTER, true, glyph[i].ch, bb);
00590         }
00591       }
00592       curve_dist += annot_dist;
00593     }
00594   }
00595   delete[] glyph;
00596 }

00598 #if 0
00599 
00600 void auto_conrec(psstream& out, int i1, int i2, int j1, int j2, grid_type* g, \
00601   double x0, double y0, double sx, double sy)
00602 {
00603   double minor_dz = 1.0;
00604   double minor_width = 0.0;
00605   double z1 = ceil(g->z1 / minor_dz) * minor_dz;
00606   double z2 = floor(g->z2 / minor_dz) * minor_dz;
00607   const int n = (int) ((z2 - z1) / minor_dz) + 1;
00608   float *level = new float[n];
00609   for (int k = 0; k < n; ++k)
00610     level[k] = float(z1+k*(z2-z1)/(n-1));
00611 
00612   int major_step = 10;
00613   double major_width = 0.5;
00614   double major_dz = major_step * minor_dz;
00615   int first_major = (int) (ceil(z1 / major_dz) * major_dz - z1) / minor_dz;
00616 
00617   vertex_type ver;
00618   edge_type *me = new edge_type[n];
00619   edge_type *ce = new edge_type[n+1];
00620   marching_squares(g->cx, g->cy, i1, i2-1, j1, j2-1, g->zz, n, level, ver, me, ce);
00621 
00622   convert(x0-sx*i1/(i2-i1-1), y0-sy*j1/(j2-j1-1), sx/(i2-i1-1), sy/(j2-j1-1), ver);
00623 
00624   out.setgray(0.0);
00625   out.setlinewidth(minor_width);
00626   for (k = 0; k < first_major; ++k)
00627   {
00628     if (me[k].empty())
00629       continue;
00630     out.newpath();
00631     plotpath(out, ver, me[k]);
00632     if (minor_width > 0.0)
00633       hatch_edge(out, minor_width, 20, ver, me[k]);
00634     out.stroke();
00635   }
00636   while (k < n)
00637   {
00638     if (!me[k].empty())
00639     {
00640       out.setlinewidth(major_width);
00641       out.newpath();
00642       plotpath(out, ver, me[k]);
00643       hatch_edge(out, major_width, 20, ver, me[k]);
00644       out.stroke();
00645     }
00646 
00647     out.setlinewidth(minor_width);
00648     for (int j = k+1; j < n && j < k+major_step; ++j)
00649     {
00650       if (me[j].empty())
00651         continue;
00652       out.newpath();
00653       plotpath(out, ver, me[j]);
00654       if (minor_width > 0.0)
00655         hatch_edge(out, minor_width, 20, ver, me[j]);
00656       out.stroke();
00657     }
00658     k = j;
00659   }
00660 
00661   back_polygon bgr(out);
00662   for (k = first_major; k < n; k += major_step)
00663   {
00664     char text[16];
00665     sprintf(text, "%.0f", level[k]);
00666     annotpath(out, ver, me[k], text, 60.0, major_width * 0.5, &bgr);
00667   }
00668 
00669   delete[] ce;
00670   delete[] me;
00671   delete[] level;
00672 }
00673 
00674 #endif
00675 
00676 #if 0
00677 
00678 #define DATA_FOLDER "d:\\dat\\"
00679 
00680 int main()
00681 {
00682   int k;
00683   grid_type g;
00684   if (!read_grid(DATA_FOLDER "depth-to-top.grd", &g))
00685     return 1;
00686 
00687   psstream out("zz.ps");
00688   out.selectmedia(psstream::FORMAT_A3, psstream::PORTRAIT);
00689   out.newpage();
00690 
00691   double dx = g.x2 - g.x1, dy = g.y2 - g.y1;
00692   double pg_width = out.pagewidth();
00693   double pg_height = out.pageheight();
00694   double pg_margin = 40.0;
00695   double px = pg_width - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00696   double py = pg_height - 2.0 * pg_margin;
00697   double x0, y0, sx, sy;
00698   if (px * dy < py * dx)
00699   {
00700     x0 = pg_margin;
00701     sx = px;
00702     sy = px * dy / dx;
00703     y0 = 0.5 * (pg_height - sy);
00704   }
00705   else
00706   {
00707     y0 = pg_margin;
00708     sy = py;
00709     sx = py * dx / dy;
00710     x0 = 0.5 * (pg_width - sx);
00711   }
00712 
00713   out.setfont("Helvetica", 4.0);
00714   auto_conrec(out, 0, g.cx, 0, g.cy, &g, x0, y0, sx, sy);
00715   out.setgray(0.0);
00716   out.setlinewidth(1.0);
00717   out.rectstroke(x0, y0, sx, sy); 
00718   delete[] g.zz;
00719 
00720   return 0;
00721 }
